We add an entry about the beginning of each process.
Add an entry in the import_history table about the beginning of each process.
Добавляем запись в таблице import_history о начале каждого процесса.
Алгоритм импорта данных

Before starting the next import, we are looking for unfinished processes with "progress" statuses for import / lot, import / lotImage, import / auction We take the saved data and try again. Then we continue on the last process "items / getAuctionItems.api, auctions / getAllAuctions.api" that have the status "progress".
We wrap the processing process with try/catch, in case we update the status to error and write in the error field json process name, string and error that throws the exception.
We add an entry about the beginning of each process. We save the data for processing in the "content" field.
If the process fails, the next time we continue to work with the same auction.
Before starting the processing of a new auction, check if it has the "progress" status, if yes, then take another auction.
Перед началом обработки нового аукциона проверем не имеет ли он статус "progress", если да, то берём другой аукцион.
Before starting to process a new auction, check if it has the "progress" status. If the process fails, the next time we continue to work with the same auction.
We redo everything in one process. We receive data from bidspirit and do not load new ones until we process all previously loaded ones.

The problem arises when iPhone users using the Safari browser try to log in or register through a submit form that sends a request to users / register or users / login.
Проблема возникает когда пользователи iPhone используя браузер Safari пытаются авторизоваться или зарегистрироваться через форму отправка которых отправляет запрос на users/register или users/login.
Hello! We again identified a problem with authorization and registration on iOs. There was a similar problem earlier in the Chrome browser.
Аналогичная проблема была ранее в браузере Chrome.
Здравствуйте! Снова выявили проблему с авторизацией и регистрацией на iOs.
Sorry to bother you with this question, we found everything you need on the site.

A notification about the registration of a new Member will be sent to Admin and Admin will be able to set the Member as active. https://app.moqups.com/2wM2h6swuU/view/page/ad631cc1a
Member will fill up
Member will
Member will fill up the registration form

Stage 1 Clients will fill up the form with price, weekdays, area and type of rooms and will get an explanation about the future process screen. https://app.moqups.com/f713U3G7ar/view/page/ad64222d5 Stage 2 After each offer is published by a Member, if this offer mutch the form Client fills up - system will try to send push notification to Client. If the system will not be able to do it - it will try to send sms. If we don’t have a mobile number or sms will not be sent - will send an email. Stage 3 Clients will get the offer by push notification, sms or email and will be able to mark the offer as not relevant to call the Member. https://app.moqups.com/f713U3G7ar/view/page/a73e717f4 All calls will be recorded using call redirect service.
Do not forget to clear the cache in the browser by pressing Ctrl + F5
Не забываем очистить кеш в браузере нажатием Ctrl + F5
